problems.impact: Minor performance degradation in lists with many buttons
problems.affectedScenarios: Product lists, menu items with multiple buttons
problems.reproduction: 1. Place Button in frequently updating parent\n2. Observe re-renders with React DevTools

problems.impact: Screen readers cannot determine button purpose
problems.reproduction: 1. Create button with only icon prop\n2. Check with screen reader

rootCause.issue: No automatic aria-label for icon buttons
